Name: Bear Claw
Description: Deal 2 damage. If the Bear is awake, also deal 3 damage to another enemy.

Name: Catch Fish
Description: Gain 2 vitality. If the Bear is awake, gain 5 vitality instead.

Name: Mark Territory
Description: Put the top two cards of your deck onto your field as actions for your partner.

Name: Poke the Bear
Description:
Gain 3 vitality.
If the Bear is hibernating, the Bear performs their draw ability.

Name: Hunker Down
Description:
Deal 2 damage.
If the Bear is awake, the Bear performs their draw ability.
